original_title: サッカー部の女子マネージャーは毎日、顧問教師の性処理をさせられています。 倉本すみれ
overview: Thanks to the hard work of the students, it was decided that if they won the next match, they would be able to go all over the country. But there was one thing that bothered me. In our soccer club, where romance is prohibited, captain Shota and manager Yukie suddenly get close. Yukie, who I love so much, turns into such a flirtatious man... I didn't want to believe it. I don't care about the national convention. I'll remove that man from the regular list. And make Yukie mine.
title: The Female Manager Of The Soccer Club Is Forced To Sexually Treat Her Advisor Teacher Every Day. Sumire Kuramoto
